page.title: 05MY DAY AT DAIRSIE SCHOOL
page.content: My name is Julie Nicol. I go to Dairsie School at 08.45. Mrs.. Kircaldy, the lollipop lady, crosses me over the road. We do our Maths in the morning then we have playtime. In the playground there is a shed where we go when it rains. We also have a football pitch and hopscotch painted in the playground. There are two gates in the playground - one for us and another for teachers' cars to come in. After we have come in we do English and at 12.30 we have our lunch. Some people have school dinners, others packed lunches or go home. We go out for lunch break when we finish our lunch. Sometimes the boys play football or chasing games. We go in at 13.15 and do Art, Crafts or Music and go home at 15.00.
